body_html: I've just rebuilt freshly cloned repo (submodule update --init in the dockerfile was needed), and a repo on which I manually ran submodule update --init before building docker image with the current Dockerfile. It works, I don't know what state your repo was it to make this fix necessary.

body: I've just rebuilt freshly cloned repo (```submodule update --init``` in the dockerfile was needed), and a repo on which I manually ran ```submodule update --init``` before building docker image with the current Dockerfile. It works, I don't know what state your repo was it to make this fix necessary.
